author: PlayStation
description:
Embrace the challenge and win big where you play with PlayStation® Tournaments.

With always-on tournaments that are just a click away on your PS5® console, push your skills to the limit and satisfy your craving for competition.

From confident pros to casuals and everyone in between, there’s a place (and a prize) for every kind of player here. Whether you're going for the ultimate fatality, tie-breaking touchdown, combo-fueled K.O., or match-ending goal, dominate the ranks for your chance to earn limited-time rewards.

Level up your love of the game and experience the next dimension of competitive play with PlayStation® Tournaments.

*PlayStation® Tournaments supports a wide range of game titles. To sign up for a tournament on your PS5® console, navigate to the Game Hub located on the PS5® home screen and scroll down to the “Upcoming Tournaments” carousel. Tournament details, including available prizes, will be listed on the tournament card. Choose a tournament that fits your schedul
title: Pre-Game Rituals | PlayStation Tournaments

author: PlayStation
description:
A new entry in the AI: THE SOMNIUM FILES series, No Sleep For Kaname Date - From AI: THE SOMNIUM FILES is coming to PS5® and PS4® on February 26, 2026!

No Sleep For Kaname Date - From AI: THE SOMNIUM FILES Story Summary
After The New Cyclops Serial Killings was resolved, internet idol Iris Sagan (known as "A-set") is abducted by a UFO and forced to participate in a perilous escape game called The Third Eye Game. Meanwhile, in another part of the city, a mysterious device is discovered. It resembles a coffin, and attached to it is a note that reads:

"Psync me"

Relying on a tenuous line of communication with the missing Iris, one man rises once again, determined to track down the UFO that should not even exist. Together with his partner, the AI-Ball Aiba, he sets out on a quest. That man...is Special Agent Kaname Date.

Wishlist on the PlayStation Store 👉  https://store.playstation.com/concept/10010826

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: No Sleep For Kaname Date – From AI: The Somnium Files - System Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
